import React from 'react'; import './Buttons.css'; import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Button, Input } from '@material-ui/core'; class Buttons extends React.Component { render() { return (
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ result: state.result, history: state.history, formula: state.formula, isShowHistory: state.isShowHistory }) const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ onAllClear: (aclr) => dispatch(onAllClear(aclr)), onBackSpace: (bck) => dispatch(onBackSpace(bck)), onClear: (clr) => dispatch(onClear(clr)), onEqual: (eql) => dispatch(onEqual(eql)), buttonClicked: (val) => dispatch(buttonClicked(val)) }); export default connect( mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps, )(Buttons);
